price: Rárá. A máa ṣàkọsílẹ̀ ohun tó ń wí. A sì máa fẹ ìyà lójú fún un tààrà.
arabic: كَلَّاۚ سَنَكۡتُبُ مَا يَقُولُ وَنَمُدُّ لَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ مَدّٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: kallā sanaktubu mā yaqūlu wanamuddu lahu mina al-ʿadhābi maddan
